name: The Square (FaraoxGames)
description:
The Square or "Geometry Dash 2.2" is my first game and a plateformer. You're a square that jump in a cave. There'll be an update soon if it has good feedbacks, so give me some ! The game is empty so it just to say if it can be improve. Also be kind with me :).

Donate if you're rich and dont worry about money lol.
